description: This file defines a theme configuration class for a Flutter application, including color schemes and style settings for light and dark themes.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: Provides static methods and properties for theme styles used across the Flutter app.

methods.name: lightTheme
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured for the light theme.

methods.name: darkTheme
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured for the dark theme.
